divs: Sighting DetailsOn good weather days, I take random pictures of the sky. I then down load the pictures to my computer to see if there are any unknowns. A picture taken on Aug. 8, 2008 at 12:56 PM shows what looks like a black triangle UFO. I did not see or hear the object when taking the photo. The UFO was in the NE at approximately 70 to 80 degrees elevation. The weather conditions were perfect with a blue sky and a few clouds. The object is in the upper left with a cloud above it. The top of a maple tree is in the lower left corner of the picture. There may be a prosaic explanation for the object, but it looks like a black triangle when you zoom in on it. A photo expert would need to give an authoritative opinion. The camera: Canon SD630 6.0 mega pixel I will try to attach the photo to this report. If the attachment does not occur, I will mail a hard copy to MUFON.
Summary: Daylight photo of a possible black triangle UFO passing overhead
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Yorktown
There were no other sightings in Yorktown on or around August 8th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
